title: IP Rewards

embed.description: Lead Producer New001 gives an update on Runes Reforged, changes to leveling, details of the Runes transition plan, and more! Learn more about the changes to Leveling and Rewards: http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards Timestamps: 0:00 - Intro/Runes Reforged Update 1:20 - Leveling and Rewards Changes 3:41 - What's happening to my current Runes?

body:
Am i understanding this right? 100 ip (blue essence) for 1 tier 3 rune, and 300 ip for a quint?

this honestly can't be legit..how is this fair?? What?? do you guys know u have different prices on runes (420,820) and you give us 100 ip for 1? 

 I don't get it:|..why would you give us, a big fuck you, to the old players???

replies.body:
That's the deal for runes purchased before the current season.  Runes you unlocked from December 1, 2016 to September 1, 2017 will receive a full return on Blue Essence.

Per the video, our devs are totally open to feedback.  Be sure to post in the link you shared with your ideas!

>December 1, 2016** to today **receive a full return on Blue Essence.

Porocles, if I may ask a dumb question:
"to today" refers to before the announcement and drop to 10ip right?
Don't want someone going nutty and buying all the 10ip runes thinking they get essence ROFL.
Yeah, September 1, 2017.  Thanks for the catch!

NP.  <3 you Porocles.
Boards are gonna be nuts for a while, try to stay well-rested^^

i just did an inventory of my runes

I believe i've invested around 80-100 k ip in runes

I have 16 (multiplied by 9) tier 3 runes..and all of them, most of them are 820 ip rune.(hybryd pen, lethality, cdr, cdr/level, health,health/level). i will get around 15.000 k ip for this:|.. this is not fair..this cost way more

Same with quints..i have 11 (multiplied by 3)..which means i've invested around 60.000 k ip only  in quints ( i have only expensive ones)..and i am getting out of this 10.000 k ip:| What??

Some of this runes i never used and they just sit there..:| 

Damn, this is so not fair towards older players like myself

This guy imo phrased it quite well
> [{quoted}](name=theProjectionist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AB63GmsN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-01T21:23:44.510+0000)
>
> Even if Riot had come out and given everyone a 100% full refund on all IP they've spent on Runes, people would still complain that they weren't getting 'extra compensation' or something like that. Be grateful that you get any kind of refund at all.
> 
> Let me use this analogy: You go to the store and buy some cutlery, like forks, knives, etc. You need lots of different kinds. Steak knives, butter knives, regular spoons, soup spoons, forks, etc. At first you're single and living alone so you only need 1, maybe 2 of each. But if you get married, have kids, start having friends and family over for gatherings, etc, you need a lot more utensils so everyone can eat.
> 
> Now, suppose that a universal multi-utensil is invented that can transform into any type of eating tool, and it's provided to everyone for free. You don't need all this cutlery anymore, so you go back to the store where you bought them and attempt to return them. Good luck with that, a store isn't gonna refund your used spoons, especially since they're now obsolete. So, what about a pawn shop? You may get some money for them but not much, since they're used and obsolete because of the new invention.
> 
> This is basically Runes. We bought them over the years to fulfill our needs as our champion pools grew, but now that the system is going away we don't need them anymore. We got our use out of them, and just like silverware there's no way we get full return on investment for them. Riot is at least giving us something, even if it's only 10% it's still better than not getting anything back.
> 
> You bought runes with no intention of ever getting a refund for them. You accepted that you had to buy them and you were willing to do so. But now, as soon as a refund is announced, everyone goes crazy and expects massive compensation as if it was promised from the beginning, which it never was. You got your use out of them, Riot has no obligation to refund you, so be happy that you're getting some compensation at all, and more importantly, an even better system that is now **completely free.**

Also I want to add this logic is very wonky... It'd make more sense and prove the point you are trying to make better if when this new "universal multi-utensil" comes along and is provided for free to everyone, that when getting this new utensil, they also took away all the other utensils that you saved up to buy. We don't get to keep our runes. We cannot use our runes. If we leave our fantastic new multi-utensil at work, we can still use our other utensils. We can't decide that we don't want to use the new runes system because our AP Mid Burst rune page would be better. We are being given a free multi-utensil, and they are taking every knife, fork, and spoon away, and saying "here, take these toothpicks as some sort of... reward!?". So no dude. That doesn't sum it up.

it's not the same thing

you actually had to buy runes in order to play the game properly..this was the system.. they decided to change that. It's very good what they are trying to do, however, since people were forced to buy certain runes, in order to play the game at an even level..it's not fair towards us.
 
your examples fits more, if you are talking about skins.. not something that its essential to the game.

basicly, the game forced me to buy runes and invest in this system..and now, they want to piss on my time, grinding the runes..you find this fair?

I completely agree. It is not fair. I remember spending a good chunk of my time one season playing hours upon hours just to scrape enough IP to fill my stockpile up so that I could play this game "properly". I even remember spending a lot of my hard earned money to buy rune pages so that I could organize and play more efficiently, and during this time that I was burning through my IP on runes, I was spending real hard-earned money on champions, because you couldn't buy runes with RP (thank god for that now that we see how little we are valued) so it pisses me off to think "hey that IP you used ended up being a waste in the long run, ultimately a bad investment for my future in this game. At least if I spent IP on champions I'd have them forever. And honestly getting back 1500 per rune page is bogus when we spend RP on them, the 4 pages get a skin is bogus as well, you could just give the RP value of the skin we'd receive so at least we could for sure buy something we wanted, because I own all champions and I just know I'm gonna get some pos skin for a champion I don't play, I don't understand what the difference is, it feels like you're thinking is, "We'll toss them a good priced skin, but it'll be random so that there is a chance it won't be something they wanted and then we can still profit off of them buying the skin they really want".. which is crap? I've spent over $2,000 on this game... This game holds a lot of value to me, and I don't like that even $1 of that 2,000 total is feeling wasted, it's not fair. I really hate that the time I've spent playing your game, investing in my future in League seems so unimportant to Riot, I really don't understand how it can be that hard to just honor your players, to give back to the people who have made this game what it is? So for me, yeah it is unfair.

so yeah..FAIR GAME

my suggestions:

-Modify the refund value on runes to scale with the price of the original rune STARTING at a 50% value and only going up from there (although its pretty clear you guys dont wanna do this)

So what I offer is this idea instead

-**Give a massive IP bonus per season the account has been active** . A Bonus IP  reward per season since account creation. (EX: Players who have been here since Season 2 would get 50k extra IP since its now Season 7). This number could either be flat or exponential .



Using 10k IP reward as an example you can either give players a flat amount per season

10 - 1 seasons
20 - 2 seasons
30 - 3 seasons
40 - 4 seasons
50 k IP for a player that has played 5 seasons 

OR

you can go the mulplicative route

5 - 1 season
10 -2 seasons
20 - 3 seasons
40 - 4 seasons
80 k IP for a player that has played 5 seasons

This way long time players would get the absolute most out of this and newer players would only get an extra champ or two. People who have played since Season 1 or Beta would outright have enough IP to get Urfwick. (Yay math!)

Many people who complain are really stupid in the sense that they don't understand what they are complaining about. 
There is a MASSIVE MISUNDERSTANDING. Many people who are complaining think that they only get 100-300ip as a refund for their runes. This is wrong. If you listen to the video closely, he says that the runes are refunded for their original price.
In addition, there is a 100-300ip reward for those who bought the runes before season 7. 
For example, if you bought a 410ip mark rune in season 6, the preseason will REFUND YOU for 410ip PLUS (+) 100ip.

This means you get 510ip for a 410ip rune, for spending the effort to earn/save ip and buy it early.
You do not get refunded 100ip!!!!!!! (for those of you who think so)
This is clearly NOT UNFAIR. 
I am pro-riot for this discussion.
